subject: Love (Emotion)
Cold War Era
Olympic Games
Track and Field
Deaths (Obituaries)
organizations: National Track and Field Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Mr. Connolly won the hammer throw at the 1956 Olympics despite a withered left arm, and later married the women’s discus champion.
snippet: Mr. Connolly won the hammer throw at the 1956 Olympics despite a withered left arm, and later married the women’s discus champion.
